targets.query: from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "co2")
from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pm25")
from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temp")
from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "voc")
from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "nox")
from(bucket: "${bucket}") |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "humidity")
